scripts.dev: bun run --filter frontend dev & bun run --filter backend dev
scripts.build: bun run build:shared && bun run build:backend && bun run build:frontend
scripts.type-check: bun run type-check:shared && bun run type-check:backend && bun run type-check:frontend
scripts.lint: bun run lint:frontend && bun run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: bun run lint:fix:frontend && bun run lint:fix:backend
scripts.quality: bun run format:check && bun run lint && bun run type-check
